comment: She will lie thru her teeth. I dont know what her purpose is to try and destroy johnny. He doesnt deserve this. No one deserves to be ripped down and falsly accused such as johnny has been. I really feel for him and all the stress this witch is putting him thru. Im also angry at WB and Disney. Why is it that she gets to continue her roles when johnny was cast out of his when she is the abuser, not johnny. I hope all truth comes out and she will be raked across the coals for what she has caused. I wont watch any movie she is in. Period. Johnny is a ledgend. A good father and a loving husband. Happy fathers day johnny! You have beautiful children. I admire vennesa paradis too for being their mother. I really hope you win this one and put this sorry example of a person in her place!!

comment: Perjury should be life in prison and when the ACLU heard AH committed perjury, which would have been apparent  knowledge to them, they should have rallied around JD to fight the injustice but no, they rally around AH and apparently believes she has the liberty to commit perjury. What was the original purpose of the ACLU is now the exact opposite of intended. Also - if aware of a crime it is the duty to report the crime not to cover that crime up. When will criminal charges be brought against the ACLU!  Heard stated she donated not that she would donate sometime in the next ten years. ACLU is supposed to fight against slimy lawyers but maybe they can't for to me it seems like the ACLU is swimming in slime.
